text: Raheem Shaquille Sterling (born 8 December 1994) is an English football player. He currently plays for the English Premier League team Chelsea in the winger position. He received the Golden Boy award for 2014 from a pan-European panel of sports journalists. == Career statistics == === Club === Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League FA Cup League Cup Europe Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Liverpool 2011–12 Premier League 3 0 0 0 0 0 — — 3 0 2012–13 Premier League 24 2 1 0 1 0 10 0 — 36 2 2013–14 Premier League 33 9 3 0 2 1 — — 38 10 2014–15 Premier League 35 7 5 1 4 3 8 0 — 52 11 Total 95 18 9 1 7 4 18 0 — 129 23 Manchester City 2015–16 Premier League 31 6 2 1 4 1 10 3 — 47 11 2016–17 Premier League 33 7 5 1 1 0 8 2 — 47 10 2017–18 Premier League 33 18 2 1 3 0 8 4 — 46 23 2018–19 Premier League 34 17 4 3 3 0 10 5 0 0 51 25 2019–20 Premier League 33 20 4 1 5 3 9 6 1 1 52 31 2020–21 Premier League 23 9 1 1 3 2 7 1 — 34 13 Total 187 77 18 8 19 6 52 21 1 1 277 113 Career total 282 95 27 9 26 10 70 21 1 1 406 136 === International === Appearances and goals by national team and year National team Year Apps Goals England 2012 1 0 2014 12 0 2015 7 2 2016 9 0 2017 6 0 2018 12 2 2019 9 8 2020 2 1 Total 58 13 : As of match played 8 September 2020.
